actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the basic standard deduction allowed for child dependents with earned income.

summary.text: Children's Tax Fairness Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the basic standard deduction allowed for child dependents with earned income in the case of: (1) a child who has not attained age 19; or (2) a student who has not attained age 24.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the basic standard deduction allowed for child dependents with earned income.
